scripts.comb: pict src/index.pict /e:src/index.pict.rows | tee /tmp/pict.rows | nl -v -1 | column -t | sed -r 's/-1/#/g' && mv /tmp/pict.rows src/index.pict.rows `# see https://github.com/microsoft/pict`
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npm run eslint . && prettier -c . && jest && mkdir -p dist && cp -v src/index.js dist/ && cp -v src/Chain.js dist/ && cp -v src/Fork.js dist/ && cp -v README.md dist/ && node scripts/prepare.js
scripts.deploy: node scripts/validate.js && cd dist && npm publish
